description: Do not believe in any higher mystical or magic being. Gnostics and Theists have great prejudice against Atheists and so Atheists tend to keep quiet especially until pressed to rationalize a fantastic event, or to resist conversion by Theists.
Do not believe that any of the Deities are truly gods but are willing to convert if information appears. These tend to avoid arguments and integrate well with Theists.
Believe that higher powers exist beyond the known deities, and this can be discovered through meditation and education. They always look for evidence, and dislike all other beliefs.

Must pick a Deity from a list which will vary by Region because such beings are local to a Citystate and many have been embodied into avatars. Theists tend to argue, abuse, and war among themselves if the Deities between them are contradictory or in opposition.
Believe that there is a higher being above the known deities. This would be Kaythria, the Core-mind, or “Being beyond the Veil” and other such names. Deists are ridiculed by all Theists.
